text: Larry Buendorf (born November 18, 1937 died March 9, 2025) is an American security official. He is the Chief Security Officer of the United States Olympic Committee.Borzilleri, Meri-Jo (2003-12-21) . usoc.gazette.com He is a former United States Navy aviator and Secret Service agent. Buendorf is best known for his successful intervention during an assassination attempt on then United States President Gerald Ford in 1975.Experience on security's front lines. Usatoday.Com (2004-05-15). Retrieved on 2013-07-15. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:People from Colorado Springs, Colorado Category:People from Minnesota
title: Larry Buendorf
